text: Muntasser Hachem is an entrepreneurborn in Beirut. He is the founder and CEO of Monty Group.He founded MontyPay, MyMonty, and Neobank. Hachem was listed by ROCCO as one of the top 25 most important individuals. Hachem was awarded as Best Visionary CEO-Telecom, Middle East. == References ==
title: Muntasser Hachem
